name: die-ty-destruction
description:
This game was made as part of the GMTK game jam 2022. The aim of the jam was to create a game in 48 hours based on the theme was Roll Of The Dice. 

ME and my teammate Kieran did a combined effort we each did a bit of everything to get this game completed in the timeframe. 

Overall the jam was a great success and we really enjoyed and learnt some new things.

Would have added/changed  some things but got to the last hour and everything stop working just glad i got what i could out.

Aim of the game to kill other evil dice that are trying to kill you haha and not to die before the timer 

Controls 

WASD  - Rotate dice

F - Shoot

G - Grenade
